segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the children in the center of the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balanced precariously on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks very wobbly, almost as if it's about to tip over backwards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into a cookie jar in the open cabinet above.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His other hand holds a plate, perhaps to catch his illicit treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is looking up, hand extended, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are clearly working together in this secret operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really worry that the stool is going to give way at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height could be quite painful, especially onto a wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem so focused on the cookies, oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic scene of childhood mischief, but with real risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they manage to get down safely, cookies or not.
segments.speaker: PAR
